title: "Unsuccessful implementation: Meymott Street"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Meymott Street was a one-way street where contraflow cycling was meant to be introduced in September 2019 but it appears not to have been implemented yet.

Click [here](qualitative_assessment_intro.html) to return to main page.
